subject: College Athletics
Football
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: The game between 8-1 Penn State and 7-2 Nebraska on Saturday has been overshadowed by the wounds from the sexual abuse scandal in State College, Pa.
snippet: The game between 8-1 Penn State and 7-2 Nebraska on Saturday has been overshadowed by the wounds from the sexual abuse scandal in State College, Pa.
